SYN_015_3_7:
[Indication]
Tumor obstruction BI, Post-obstructive pneumonia.
[Anesthesia]
General Anesthesia (Rigid).
[Description]
Purulent fluid drained. Tumor in BI and RUL debulked with APC/Forceps. Balloon dilation performed. No stent placed.
[Plan]
Augmentin 10 days. Repeat CT. Oncology consult.
